etymologies: Middle English: via Old French and Italian from Arabic maṭraḥ ‘carpet or cushion’, from ṭaraḥa ‘to throw’

definitions: a fabric case filled with deformable or resilient material, used for sleeping on.
shortDefinitions: fabric case filled with deformable or resilient material

definitions: a flat structure of brushwood, concrete, or other material used as strengthening or support for foundations, embankments, etc.
shortDefinitions: flat structure of brushwood, concrete, or other material used as strengthening or support for foundations
